description: GetMeVino! is the ultimate wine directory – right on your phone. You can search for wine by variety, brand, vintage, store location and more.    Narrow your search by selecting the minimum price, max price or sort type. Then, simply tap “Find Review.” You can tap any of the resulting wines for detailed bottle information or reviews.    If you’d like to buy a bottle, GetMeVino! is equipped with a GPS system to locate the nearest store location. With just one tap you can view the top-rated wines from each store, contact the store, pull up a map and view the website. Wine selection has never been easier.    If a bottle piques your interest but you aren’t ready to buy, you can “wishlist” the wine. You can also click the “Send To” button to email or text the details to yourself or a friend.   Once you have tasted the wine, you can rate and review the bottle, adding tasting notes (tags), your own description (body) and a rating.    Once you have submitted a review or wishlisted a wine, the content will appear on your home screen for future reference. You can navigate back and forth in the application with standard WebOS gestures.    And as an added bonus… if you need to brush up on your vino terminology, there is a learn screen that offers a multitude of wine terms. Impress the best with GetMeVino!.
